Package com.soprabanking.ips.services

Class UserControllerService

java.lang.Object
com.soprabanking.ips.services.UserControllerService
@Service
public class UserControllerService
extends java.lang.Object
User Controller Service This is service class this class is used for calling userRepository class to fetch the data from database

Service methods invokes the respective methods of UserDAO,TeamDAO in order to return the required results to the UserController

Author:
kavsharma
See Also:
User, UserDAO, TeamDAO, HomeController, UserController
